description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nYear of the Trollboar:
After this creature {ACTION_provokes}, it deals damage to a random enemy equal to 25% of its {STAT_intelligence}. This effect repeats once for every 5% {STAT_health} this creature is missing.
name: Trollboar Lantern
